long_description: A jacket with stunning good looks that puts those old frumpy winter layers to shame, the women's Roxy Glee jacket offers windproof warmth on the Nordic ski trail and style you can wear anywhere. Shell fabric features a Durable Water Repellent finish to resist light moisture, and quilted insulation in the front of the jacket enhances warmth in the cold. Zip hand pockets; binding finish at hem and sleeve openings; reflective taping. Breathable fleece at sleeves and back. The Roxy Glee jacket for women features a 24.5 in. back length.
short_description: A jacket with stunning good looks that puts those old frumpy winter layers to shame, the women's Roxy Glee jacket offers windproof warmth on the Nordic ski trail and style you can wear anywhere.
